title: Riots servers are getting more and more worse
body:
I can go maybe 2, 3 or 4 matches having no lag, 53 ping, no problems what so ever. My next match though load in, have no connection problems, and then at the 2 minute mark I get disconnected and can't even log in to the client for hours on end. I'm getting really frustrated with this and really hope Riot can get their servers together, so I can actually enjoy the game again. 

Really hope this doesn't start giving me leaver penalties, that would really piss me off.

replies.body:
I strongly recommend that you stay clear of matchmaking a game before we can figure out what's causing that. D:

It would seem some intermittent issue is causing you to DC some of your games. When that happens, and you try to relog, do you get any error messages at all that might shed some light on what's preventing you from doing so?

While we're at it, I also strongly recommend that you hit up our Troubleshooting guide for Connection issues [**over here**](http://riot.com/12B7oac). There's a lot of steps you can try to help us eliminate potential trouble and help find the root of the issue! Let me know if it helps out at all and what kinda messages you're seeing when the problem affects you. :)
